directions: In saucepan, melt butter and add flour, stirring well to form a rue.Cook for about 1-2 minutes. Add milk 1/2 a cup/120 mL at a time while whisking mixture together. Add cheese and all ingredients except, jalapenos. Whisk until thick and melted through. This process should take about 8-10 minutes total. Once cheese sauce has reached a good thick consistency, add jalapenos and stir through. Keep cheese sauce on warm setting until hot dogs are cooked.

Preheat grill for medium-high heat. Wrap each hot dog with a strip of bacon. You might need to cut bacon to fit. Place dogs onto grill and cook for 8 minutes, turning occasionally until hot dog is cooked and bacon is good and crisp. Remove from heat, place into warmed hot dog or deli bun, top with cheese sauce and serve.

title: Bacon Wrapped Hot Dog with Jalapeno Cheese Sauce
